name: WRC 3: FIA World Rally Championship
description:
The official game of the FIA World Rally Championship is back with the most complete Rally simulation ever created. Race on 6 official Rally, challenge the most famous driver of 2012 championship and test your skills. With WRC 3, Milestone has developed a masterpiece: the definitive Rally game!
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
Network Players 2-6
2048KB Minimum
